function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Participants may have low practical capacity to comply with COVID-19 mitigation measures, as indicated by the measures of their ability to comply with the measures and the opportunity to violate them.","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases and contributing to the continuation of the pandemic.","Mitigation":"Provide targeted education and support to improve practical compliance with measures; enforce strict penalties for violations.","Technologies":"Educational resources, training programs, surveillance and monitoring systems.","People":"Participants, general public, vulnerable populations.","Owner":"Health authorities, government, public health organizations."},{"Description":"Participants may have limited knowledge of the current COVID-19 mitigation measures, leading to non-compliance and misinformation.","Impact":"Risk of incorrect adherence to measures, potential spread of misinformation, and increased infection rates.","Mitigation":"Implement public awareness campaigns, improve accessibility of information, and provide accurate and up-to-date guidelines.","Technologies":"Information dissemination platforms, mobile applications, communication tools.","People":"Participants, general public, vulnerable populations.","Owner":"Health authorities, government, public health organizations."},{"Description":"Participants may perceive the COVID-19 measures as unclear, leading to confusion and potential non-compliance.","Impact":"Increased risk of misunderstanding and non-compliance with measures, resulting in higher transmission rates.","Mitigation":"Develop clear and accessible communication materials, offer guidance and support for interpretation of measures.","Technologies":"Information dissemination platforms, interactive websites, communication tools.","People":"Participants, general public, vulnerable populations.","Owner":"Health authorities, government, public health organizations."}]}
